Strings.String: Enemy Entrance Room Cover Room Ladder Room Gap Jump Room Drop Down Room
Latch this biotic field onto enemies to jerk them toward you, doing massive damage in the process.
Increase force and damage of biotic detonations by {Evolve_PowerComboBonus%p}%.
Do an additional {Evolve_DoTPercent%p}% damage over {Evolve_DoTDuration} seconds.
Give the power a {Evolve_NoCooldownChance%p}% chance of not causing a cooldown. Increase the time that lifted targets can be detonated by {Evolve_ComboDurationBonus%p}%.
Penetrate through shields and barriers, lifting any target without armor but with reduced force.

Stun and electrocute your enemies with an EMP-packed grenade.
Effective against shields and barriers.
Add an electrical effect that does {Evolve_DoTDamage%p}% additional damage over {Evolve_DoTDuration} seconds.

Reveal weaknesses in defenses, increasing all damage done to the target and slowing its movement speed.
Provide the entire squad with a tactical readout. Only one scan can be active on a target.
Hack into a target's implants to disrupt internal systems and resistances.
Quarian electrical weapon that's best at close range.

This electrical weapon improves upon the arc pistol's design by generating a sustained current on its target. This weapon is named for the quarian Reegar family, whose marines have served valiantly against the geth.
Heavy turian sniper rifle with explosive rounds and an automatic scope for all-range fighting.

This turian antimateriel rifle is modified to kill Reaper enemies. The Krysae's scope uses a rangefinder that adjusts to keep the target in proper proportion to the shooter, which comes in useful when the sniper is forced into close range. Its specialized ammunition is both armor-piercing and explosive. In a desperate move, the turians released its specifications over the extranet so that nearly anyone with a fabricator could manufacture this weapon to help the war effort.
Full-auto Cerberus rifle with low recoil and heat generation.

These Cerberus-modified Mattock rifles are fully automatic. Cerberus gunsmiths reined in the recoil issues, resulting in a gun that stays on target but delivers slightly less punch per round than a standard Mattock. As such, the weapon is typically utilized by Cerberus's elite troops, who train constantly to make every burst count.
Vorcha are considered vermin by other species inhabiting Citadel space, but their unique physiology and innate aggressiveness make them shockingly durable combatants.

A vorcha's resilience and malleable DNA allow them to evolve and adapt to any situation, making them formidable opponents on the battlefield. Their lightning-quick pounce is a direct result of their societally ingrained bloodlust.

A result of the Illusive Man's early experiments in enhanced human physiology, Project Phoenix subjects are highly skilled combat and biotic specialists. When the Illusive Man turned to indoctrination in order to ensure the loyalty of his troops, many Phoenix operatives defected and joined the Alliance in order to stop the Reapers.

Phoenix operatives are highly skilled combat and biotic specialists. Their ability to manipulate Cerberus lash and stasis technology, backed up by their powerful skills, make them invaluable assets on the battlefield.
Drive the lash into the ground to cause area-of-effect damage and devastating direct damage.
Increase all weapon damage done to the target by {Evolve_WeaponDamageBonus%p}%.
Increase all power damage done to the target by {Evolve_PowerDamageBonus%p}%.
Increase the target's movement speed penalty by {Evolve_MovementSpeedBonus%p}%.
Increase all damage done to the target by {Evolve_DamageTakenBonus%p}%.
Increase scan duration by {Evolve_DurationBonus%p}%. Momentarily reveal enemies within {Evolve_AreaScanRadius%m} meters of the target with an initial scanning pulse.
Use targeting VIs to pinpoint enemy weak points. Aim will be autocorrected to maximize damage. Headshot Damage: +<CUSTOM0>%
Improve armor joints to maximize the force and damage delivered through melee blows. Melee Damage: +<CUSTOM0>%
Enhance the ability of armor to bear loads, speeding up cooldown so that powers can be used more often. Power Recharge Speed: +<CUSTOM0>%
Sharpen mental alertness and precision under stress to aid the performance of tech or biotic powers. Power Damage: +<CUSTOM0>%
Add a backup power supply to the user's shields, decreasing the time before they can be brought back online. Shield Regen Speed: +<CUSTOM0>%
Amplify the power systems that generate shields to raise their effective strength. Shields: +<CUSTOM0>%
Add power to assault rifles to increase round velocity and damage. Assault Rifle Damage: +<CUSTOM0>%
Add power to sniper rifles to increase round velocity and damage. Sniper Rifle Damage: +<CUSTOM0>%
Add power to shotguns to increase round velocity and damage. Shotgun Damage: +<CUSTOM0>%
Add power to pistols to increase round velocity and damage. Pistol Damage: +<CUSTOM0>%
Add power to submachine guns to increase round velocity and damage. SMG Damage: +<CUSTOM0>%
Decrease weapon kickback and improve firing stability by upgrading autotargeting electronics. Weapon Stability: +<CUSTOM0>%
Add a biotic effect to a target that can be detonated. Increase damage by {Evolve_DamageBonus%p}%.
Add an electrical effect to a target that can be detonated. Increase damage by an additional {Evolve_DoTDamage%p}% for {Evolve_DoTDuration} seconds.
Increase effectiveness against armor and barriers by {Evolve_ArmourBonus%p}%.
Increase radius by {Evolve_RadiusBonus2%p}%. Increase the number of targets hit by {Evolve_MaximumImpactTargets}.
Add extra grenade storage compartments to the user's armor. Max Grenades: +<CUSTOM3>
Add power to Alliance-manufactured weapons to increase round velocity and damage. Alliance Weapons: +<CUSTOM0>%
Add power to Cerberus-manufactured weapons to increase round velocity and damage. Cerberus Weapons: +<CUSTOM0>%
Add power to geth-manufactured weapons to increase round velocity and damage. Geth Weapons: +<CUSTOM0>%
Add power to krogan-manufactured weapons to increase round velocity and damage. Krogan Weapons: +<CUSTOM0>%
Add power to quarian-manufactured weapons to increase round velocity and damage. Quarian Weapons: +<CUSTOM0>%
Add power to turian-manufactured weapons to increase round velocity and damage. Turian Weapons: +<CUSTOM0>%
Deploy this modification package to increase assault rifle power and grenade storage. Assault Rifle Damage: +<CUSTOM0>% Max Grenades: +<CUSTOM3>
Optimize pistol and biotic amp power to increase damage. Pistol Damage: +<CUSTOM0>% Biotic Damage: +<CUSTOM1>%
Optimize shield strength and the speed of shield restoration. Shields: +<CUSTOM0>% Shield Regen Speed: +<CUSTOM1>%
Optimize shotgun and armor hydraulic power to increase shotgun and melee damage. Shotgun Damage: +<CUSTOM0>% Melee Damage: +<CUSTOM1>%
Optimize energy supplies with multicore VIs to increase submachine gun damage and to recharge powers faster. SMG Damage: +<CUSTOM0>% Power Recharge Speed: +<CUSTOM1>%
Optimize sniper rifle and tech power damage. Sniper Rifle Damage: +<CUSTOM0>% Tech Damage: +<CUSTOM1>%

$735007
Additional stacks last for a short time. Slows power use. Lasts until deactivated.
Increase melee damage of each stack by {Evolve_MeleeDamageBonus%p}%.
Increase health regeneration of each stack by {Evolve_HealthRegenerationBonus1%p}%.
Increase power damage bonus of each stack by {Evolve_PowerDamageBonus%p}%.
Increase weapon damage bonus of each stack by {Evolve_WeaponDamageBonus%p}%.
Increase movement speed bonus by {Evolve_MovementComboBonus%p}%. Increase melee damage bonus by {Evolve_MeleeDamageComboBonus%p}%.
Increase health regeneration of each stack by an additional {Evolve_HealthRegenerationBonus2%p}%.

Fire a powerful short-range flame attack. The flames will persist for a max duration and can be canceled early for a faster recharge.
Highly effective against armor.
Increase damage to shields and barriers by {Evolve_ShieldMultiplier%p}%.

$735007
Additional stacks last for {EffectDuration} seconds. Slows power use by {EncumbrancePenalty%p}%. Lasts until deactivated.
Increase damage to shields and barriers by {Evolve_ShieldDamageBonus%p}%.

These operatives had upgrades installed by their former employer Cerberus to dramatically improve biotic and combat skills.
More power damage. More weapon damage. More strength.
Reduce the weight of pistols and shotguns by {Evolve_WeaponEncumbranceBonus%p}%.

A vorcha's adaptable nature gives them advantages in combat.
More power damage. More weapon damage. More strength.
Reduce the weight of shotguns and assault rifles by {Evolve_WeaponEncumbranceBonus%p}%.
The vorcha flies into a frenzy, increasing movement speed, health regeneration, and melee damage. Each kill intensifies these effects and can stack up to three times.
